msg: Fix NPE when POST size exceeds limit set by maxPostSize. Also remove log attribute

author: billbarker
msg: Fix problem where the "first" Valve wasn't removed from the Pipeline.
Of course, this can only happen when running Tomcat as Embedded, or with advanced JMX management scenarios.

msg: Improve the SSIFilter's handling of pages with non-default encoding.
